Methods in libshapedraw that return LibShapeDraw
 LibShapeDraw LibShapeDraw.addEventListener(LSDEventListener listener)
          Register an event listener to receive LSDEvents.
 LibShapeDraw LibShapeDraw.addShape(Shape shape)
          Register a Shape to be rendered by this API instance.
 LibShapeDraw LibShapeDraw.clearEventListeners()
          Unregister all event listeners that were registered to this API instance.
 LibShapeDraw LibShapeDraw.clearShapes()
          Unregister all Shapes owned by this API instance, no longer rendering them.
 LibShapeDraw LibShapeDraw.removeEventListener(LSDEventListener listener)
          Unregister an event listener.
 LibShapeDraw LibShapeDraw.removeShape(Shape shape)
          Unregister a Shape, no longer rendering it.
 LibShapeDraw LibShapeDraw.setVisible(boolean visible)
          Whether this API instance's shapes will be rendered.
 LibShapeDraw LibShapeDraw.setVisibleWhenHidingGui(boolean visibleWhenHidingGui)
          Whether this API instance's shapes are considered part of the game world (true) or part of the GUI (false, default).
 LibShapeDraw LibShapeDraw.verifyInitialized()
          Convenience method to make sure that LibShapeDraw is fully initialized, with its rendering hooks properly installed.
